title: Clean Container Images: A Supply Chain Security Revolution
author: Jeffrey Burt
description: Chainguard's new CVE Visualization tool shows enterprises exactly how much time and money they save by using vulnerability-free container images instead of traditional CVE-laden ones.
cntitle: 清洁的容器镜像：供应链安全革命
cndescription: Chainguard 新推出的 CVE 可视化工具可以精确地向企业展示，通过使用无漏洞容器镜像代替传统的充满 CVE 的镜像，他们能够节省多少时间和金钱。
